Package MessageObjects

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Message
    interface Message
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ActiveCard
    class ActiveCard provides custom (playerID, card) - pairs for messageType CurrentCards
    ActivePhase
    class ActivePhase Implements a message that signals the current game phase
    CardPlayed
    class CardPlayed Implements a message that's used to send each card played to all clients
    CardSelected
    class CardSelected Implements a message that's used to inform all clients about a assigned register of one certain player
    CardsYouGotNow
    class CardsYouGotNow Implements message that's used to send randomly server-selected cards to one client, if that client failed to choose all cards himself within time
    CheckpointReached
    class CheckpointReached Implements message that's used to inform all clients about a player who has reached a certain checkpoint
    ConnectionUpdate
    class ConnectionUpdate Implements a message that's used to inform all clients about lost/regained connection of a certain player
    CurrentCards
    class CurrentCards Implements a message that's used to inform all clients about the active cards of the current register
    CurrentPlayer
    class CurrentPlayer Implements message that's used to send the ID of the current player to all clients
    DiscardHand
    class DiscardHand Implements a message that's used to send the ID of a player who didn't complete to fill his card registers within time
    DrawDamage
    class DrawDamage Implements a message that's used to send received damage cards to a player
    Energy
    class Energy Implements a message that's used to transmit a number of energy cubes that one player receives
    Error
    class Error Implements a message that's used to transfer any error String
    Field
    class Field Instances of Field are part of message "GameStarted" and are used to transfer the fields and all of its relevant attributes of a chosen game board.
    GameStarted
    class GameStarted Implements a message that's used to inform all Clients about a starting game and to send the chosen game board
    GameWon
    class GameWon Implements a message that's used to inform all clients about the winner
    HelloClient
    class HelloClient Implements a message that's used to send the current protocol version to the client after establishing a TCP connection
    HelloServer
    class HelloServer Implements a message that's sent from Client to Server to inform about the local protocol version, group name and whether the client is an AI or not
    Map
    class Map Instances of Map are used to represent a certain field position in combination with a list of stacked board tiles on that position.
    MapSelected
    class MapSelected Implements a message that's used to send the selected map from client to server
    MessageAdapter  
    MessageBody
    class MessageBody This class defines all relevant message attributes (except sup. messageType) of all messages provided according to the protocol.
    Movement
    class Movement Implements a message that's used to transmit the movement of a player
    MsgNames
    class MsgNames Stores specific messageTypes CURRENT_PROTOCOL_VERSION: 1.0
    NotYourCards
    class NotYourCards Implements a message that's used to inform all players about one player's number of cards in hand and cards in pile
    PickDamage
    class PickDamage Implements a message that's used to inform one client that he has to pick a number of damage cards.
    PlayCard
    class PlayCard Implements a message that's used to transmit a (upgrade) card from client to server
    PlayerAdded
    class PlayerAdded Implements a message that's used to inform all clients about a new joined player
    PlayerShooting
    class PlayerShooting Implements a message that's used to inform Client about currently shooting players
    PlayerStatus
    class PlayerStatus Implements a message that's used to inform all connected clients about a player who is ready/unready to play.
    PlayerTurning
    class PlayerTurning Implements a message that's used to inform clients about a turning robot
    PlayerValues
    class PlayerValues Implements a message that's used to transfer basic player values as name and robot from client to server
    PlayIt
    class PlayIt Implements a message that's used to send a signal to server that a client consents to play a card
    Reboot
    class Reboot Implements a message that's used to inform all clients about a rebooted player
    ReceivedChat
    class ReceivedChat Implements a chat message that should be sent from server to certain clients
    SelectCard
    class SelectCard Implements a message that's used to send one selected card to the server during programming phase.
    SelectDamage
    class SelectDamage Implements a message that's used to send selected damage cards from client to server after receiving a PickDamage message.
    SelectionFinished
    class SelectionFinished Implements a message that's used to inform other players about a player who has filled all five registers.
    SelectMap
    class SelectMap Implements a message that's used to inform the first ready player about available maps.
    SendChat
    class SendChat Implements a chat message that should be sent from client to server.
    SetStartingPoint
    class SetStartingPoint Implements a message that should be sent from client to server to select a valid starting point.
    SetStatus
    class SetStatus Implements a message that's used to signal (un-)readiness to the server.
    ShuffleCoding
    class ShuffleCoding Implements a message that's used to inform clients that the programmingDiscardPile of a player is going to be shuffled server-side.
    StartingPointTaken
    class StartingPointTaken Implements a message that should be sent to all clients after a starting point has been taken.
    TimerEnded
    class TimerEnded Implements a message that's used to inform all clients if the timer has ended and to send all playerIDs of players who didn't fill all their registers within time.
    TimerStarted
    class TimerStarted Implements a message that's used to inform all clients that timer's running now
    Welcome
    class Welcome Implements a message that's used to inform one client about his own playerID.
    YourCards
    class YourCards Implements a message that's used to inform one client at the beginning of every programming phase about his available hand cards.
